products.name: HRC-Station
products.description: The FFT linetec HRC-Station provides open access, high safety through sensors and a modular table structure. The goal is synergistic collaboration between humans and robots to improve ergonomics and efficiency.

products.name: RSS-Station
products.description: The FFT linetec RSS-Station consists of two 6-axis robots for strapping and a flexible arrangement for different packages. It monitors the process with sensor technology and enables automated tensioning and closing of strapping.

products.name: Protection Cabin EcoLine
products.description: The FFT linetec Protection Cabin EcoLine is characterized by a cost-efficient modular design and easy installation. It can be used as an inert gas welding, temperature, sound insulation or adhesive application cabin up to sizes of 5.5×5.5×4 m.

products.name: Protection Cabin ProLine
products.description: The FFT linetec Protection Cabin ProLine is based on a cost-efficient design suitable for large dimensions and extended customer-specific layout options. It can be used as an inert gas welding, temperature, sound insulation or adhesive application cabin.

products.name: RTU 7th Axis
products.description: The FFT linetec RTU 7th Axis is a linear extension for industrial robots such as ABB, KUKA and Fanuc. The first 7th Axis in Europe is used in the FibreTEC3D production line in Mücke.
